features: INSULATED SPORTS WATER BOTTLE: Goodbye sweat! The double wall insulation makes the Iron Flask sweat-free! It keeps your drink COLD for up to 24 hours, and HOT for up to 12 hours. *NOTE: ONLY the 14 Oz, 18 Oz, & 22 Oz fit in cupholders*

3 LIDS: YES, Iron Flask comes with THREE different 100% LEAK PROOF lids. Spout Lid, Flip Lid with a Handle, and a Stainless Steel Lid! *NOTE: The stainless steel lid is plastic from inside and stainless steel from outside*
18/8 PREMIUM STAINLESS STEEL: The Iron Flask is made of 18/8 Stainless steel that is 100% BPA free and non-toxic. It will never leave a metal taste or rust. HAND WASH ONLY WITH SOAPY HOT WATER!

FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: The powder coat exterior finish is a classic. It assures that you stand out with a very durable and elegant bottle. Our logo is now LASER ENGRAVED to assure the highest quality as well.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We guarantee that the high quality Iron Flask bottle will surely please you! If, for any reason, you are not 100% satisfied with the Iron Flask, we will issue you a full refund or an exchange!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality & Price
reviews.reviewText: This is my 5th iron flask purchase. I’ll be traveling more for my job and needed a bottle a bit smaller than my 40oz and with a close mouth unlike my tumblers. This fits the bill perfectly. This bottle is small enough for my luggage and fits into a cup holder plus I absolutely love the color. It will keep my drinks cold which is the point. I love this brand and the price point always fits in my budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Half price Hydro Flask
reviews.reviewText: Seriously, I don't know why anyone would buy a Hydro Flask at $60 when this product exists for around $30. (I also bought the rubber boot for about $10). I've used this water bottle 2-3 times a week for the past 6 months. I've cleaned it in the dishwasher many times (even though the bottom of the bottle says not to), and it basically looks brand new. It comes with 3 different lids, although I only ever use the spout lid. One of the biggest selling points for me when choosing this water bottle was the fact it does not need an internal straw. Straws are a pain in the butt to clean properly, and go missing all the time. The spout lid works just fine without one. It's well insulated (there is some condensations around the plastic lid area, but that's all). And, its never leaked. What more can you ask? Great product. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydration Made Effortless
reviews.reviewText: For over three years, the IRON FLASK Sports Water Bottle has been my steadfast hydration companion, and I couldn't be more pleased with its exceptional performance. As a fitness enthusiast and outdoor adventurer, staying hydrated is paramount, and this 64 oz. water bottle has effortlessly met and exceeded my hydration needs.First and foremost, the standout feature of the IRON FLASK is its impressive 64 oz. capacity. This generous size ensures that I have an ample supply of water to fuel my activities, whether I'm hitting the gym, embarking on a hike, or simply tackling a busy day at work. Despite its large capacity, I've found the bottle remarkably easy to hold and maneuver, thanks to its ergonomic design and comfortable grip.Durability is another area where the IRON FLASK truly shines. Despite enduring countless drops, bumps, and adventures, this water bottle has remained steadfastly intact. Not a single leak or crack to be found, even after years of use. Additionally, I'm delighted to report that there's absolutely no metallic taste, allowing me to enjoy pure, refreshing hydration with every sip.Cleaning this water bottle is a breeze, thanks to its wide mouth opening that accommodates easy access for thorough cleaning. Maintaining the IRON FLASK in pristine condition has never been easier, ensuring that it remains a reliable and hygienic hydration solution.In summary, I wholeheartedly recommend the IRON FLASK Sports Water Bottle to anyone in search of a dependable, high-capacity hydration companion. Its impressive durability, lack of leaks or cracks, comfortable handling, and easy cleaning make it a standout choice for athletes, adventurers, and everyday users alike. With the IRON FLASK by your side, staying hydrated has never been easier or more convenient. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is durable, easy to carry with the loop on the cap, and is keeps my water cold for some hours. I do have one that keeps it cooler longer, but it does its job. And it's pretty!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable water bottle.
reviews.reviewText: I love the colors of this glittery water bottle. It makes me happy just looking at it. Looks aside, it keeps my water icy cold even in 115° heat. The bottle is easy to clean (I use a bottle brush). The lid selection is top notch! Not many bottle come with multiple lids to chose from. The lids don’t seem to leak at all, so that’s nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works with Cirkul products, miss the straw capabilities though
reviews.reviewText: The product details from the manufacturer were a bit confusing. First I read "no straw lids" but then I saw video clips with it included, even vaguely mentioned it in one of the descriptions....and what the hecks a "Spout" lid? My sons flip top "spout" thingy lid came with straw capabilities but no such luck with mine. 🫤 Fortunately, my husbands willing to swap his straw capable lid for my strap handle lid. Him and all his co-workers swear by this product btw. His boss bought all his employees one about 2 months ago, the record breaking heat here in DFW was really taking its toll on them, got Super high Praises from 'em all I heard. I've tried out his before and I gotta say I was impressed too. Curiosity got the better of me so I ordered one for me and my son. I got the pearl one, its beautiful. My son got the Hombre yellow and Orange one....he got TWO straws with his?? 😕 Haven't tested mine yet personally but as I mentioned earlier, my husband has one and it definitely keeps his stuff cool for hours....even outside in the heat. "Best so far of all the ones he has" he says. I really like that my Cirkul cap and filter can be used with this also, another customer brought that to my attention and it was a major selling point for me. No complaints yet, does what its supposed to, its economical, looks great, its well built, Cirkul product adaptable and fits the bill for my health needs. So, other than the slightly misleading and somewhat confusing manufacturer details, I would highly recommend it. Hope this review helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great water bottle
reviews.reviewText: This insulated bottle is amazing. I have had ice water stay cold for approximately 20 hours. comes with different tops. will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am a repeat customer of Ironflask water bottles. They are extremely durable. This particular one is a cute peach color and I feel so lady like while I keep up with my water intake.
Fits in my hand perfectly, keeps my water nice and chilly.

Aunque su precio no es de los más bajos pero la verdad es que la calidad de sus materiales es muy buena. Se siente firme, el agua si se mantiene fría, y aún dejando el termo con agua no fría sino templada en el auto en pleno sol, el agua no se calienta mantiene fresca. Excelente compra!
Keeps my drinks cold, and looks cool.

reviews.reviewTitle: El producto se ve de muy buena calidad y no chorrean las tapas
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. En general en cuanto a calidad se aprecia de muy buena, las tapas que incluye funcionan correctamente y ninguna gotea.El metal tiene un sonido muy característico y elegante, la pintura que al parecer es electrostática se ve muy sólida y espero que con el paso del tiempo no se empieza despostillar. Los inconvenientes aunque no la puedes usar para beber sólo con una mano y totalmente llena es un poco pesada.

I absolutely love this flask.I bought it for my teenage boy. It’s ultra durable…(my son has dropped it a million times). He takes it everywhere. It keeps the water cold for hours and has a good capacity. Worth every penny
